description: An AI agent monitors sensor data from a semiconductor fabrication plant to predict equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules.  The goal is to minimize downtime and maximize production efficiency while adhering to strict safety and data privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Minimize unplanned downtime in the semiconductor fabrication plant by accurately predicting equipment failures and optimizing maintenance schedules using sensor data and historical maintenance records.
constraints: data_access_restrictions: Only authorized sensor data accessible
latency_limit: predictions within 1 hour of sensor data collection
